	2 . sublime  &ndash;  most satisfying / feels heavenly / incredibly beautiful.

	3 . sceptical  &ndash;  doubting / does not believe the plan would work / having no faith/confidence  in the plan.

	4 . pronounced &ndash; declared / said confidently.

	5 . deliberation  &ndash;  taking time to consider carefully.
